body_html: Why do we want that? It has almost no effect on that actual content of the file (only the device labels change), and people can always remap them when they are loaded. I'd err on the side of keeping the interface simple if we can.
body_text: Why do we want that? It has almost no effect on that actual content of the file (only the device labels change), and people can always remap them when they are loaded. I'd err on the side of keeping the interface simple if we can.
body: Why do we want that? It has almost no effect on that actual content of the file (only the device labels change), and people can always remap them when they are loaded. I'd err on the side of keeping the interface simple if we can.
